io.spine.server.commandbus

Class SeveralCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.commandbus.CommandSequence<io.spine.core.EventId,R,B,S>
      • io.spine.server.commandbus.SeveralCommands

  • @Internal
public class SeveralCommands
extends CommandSequence<io.spine.core.EventId,R,B,S>
    A sequence with two or more commands generated in response to an incoming event.

    The result of the sequence is the system command for event lifecycle aggregate.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class io.spine.server.commandbus.CommandSequence

        CommandSequence.ErrorHandler

      protected EventCausedCommands.Builder newBuilder()
      Creates a new builder for the result generated when all the commands are posted.
      EventCausedCommands postAll(CommandBus bus)
      Posts all commands to the CommandBus in the order that they were added.
      static SeveralCommands respondMany(io.spine.core.EventEnvelope event)
      Creates an empty sequence for creating two or more commands in response to the passed event.

      • postAll

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public EventCausedCommands postAll(CommandBus bus)
        Posts all commands to the CommandBus in the order that they were added.

        The size of the sequence after this method is zero if all the commands were posted successfully. Â­
